txt.en: 'I've been a fool. I let the loss of Melnith blind me to the woes of those left behind.'
'The war had taken so much from so many.'
'But to grasp a rose petal in the palm of my hand, and Nathemel's ribbon in another...'
'I see now what Melnith left behind.'
'I give up. You clearly will not relent.'
'The beauty left in the world and in the palm of my hand. I know what I must do now. Thank you, traveller.'
'If it will please you and hasten an end to your badgering, I will go to the place you describe.'
'At least let me prepare my things.'
